snippet: State prosecutors asked the judge in the Jerry Sandusky sexual abuse case to bring in a jury from another Pennsylvania county, saying it was needed because of pretrial publicity.
lead_paragraph: State prosecutors asked the judge in the Jerry Sandusky sexual abuse case to bring in a jury from another Pennsylvania county, saying it was needed because of pretrial publicity.

headline.main: Sandusky’s Prosecutors Want an Outside Jury
headline.print_headline: Sandusky’s Prosecutors Want an Outside Jury
